metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25235 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: xmltok_impl.c in Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5 lacks certain validationof encoding, such as checks for whether a UTF-8 character is valid in acertain context.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
